import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Copy, BarChart3, Download, RefreshCcw } from 'lucide-react'; export function AuthenticSymptomsContent() { // Replica of src/components/ClinicalSymptoms/index.vue // Layout: Frequency Table (Left) + Chart Controls & Chart (Right) // Mock Data based on FrequencyTable.vue structure const symptoms = [ { name: '?ㅼ궗 (Diarrhea)', count: 161, percent: '92.5%' }, { name: '蹂듯넻 (Abdominal Pain)', count: 148, percent: '85.1%' }, { name: '諛쒖뿴 (Fever)', count: 112, percent: '64.4%' }, { name: '?ㅽ븳 (Chills)', count: 78, percent: '44.8%' }, { name: '援ы넗 (Vomiting)', count: 49, percent: '28.2%' }, { name: '?먰넻 (Headache)', count: 35, percent: '20.1%' }, { name: '援ъ뿭 (Nausea)', count: 28, percent: '16.1%' }, ]; return (
{/* Summary Bar */}

?꾩긽利앹긽 ?듦퀎 (Financial Symptoms)

N=174
{/* Left: Frequency Table Card */}
{/* Header */}
利앹긽蹂?鍮덈룄??r
{/* Table Content */}
{symptoms.map((item, idx) => ( ))}
利앹긽紐?(Symptom) 鍮덈룄 (Count) 鍮꾩쑉 (%)
{item.name} {item.count} {item.percent}
{/* Right: Chart Control & Chart Area */}
{/* Chart Control Panel (Replica of ChartControlPanel.vue) */}
{/* Direction */}
?섏쭅
?섑룊
{/* Font Size */}
14
{/* Width */}
700px
{/* Color */}
{/* Chart Area (SymptomBarChart.vue Replica) */}
{/* BG Grid */}
{[100, 75, 50, 25, 0].map(p => (
{p}%
))}
{/* Bars */} {symptoms.map((s, i) => (
{/* Label on hover */}
{s.count}紐?({s.percent})
{s.name.split(' ')[0]}
))}
) }
